name: CyberRunner!
description:
Welcome to CyberRunner!

Here you can play many different endless runners in one game!
There are no in-app purchases and no ads!
You can download the apk here or download it on the play store: CyberRunner
There are 8 game modes!
Including:

Flappy Runner

Heli Runner

Lizard Runner 2D

Lizard Runner 3D

Road runner

Sun Runner

Vertical runner

Voxel Runner

The game was made in Unreal Engine 4 and with the template from https://devenabled.com/

Have fun playing!
